title: Introduction to Metabase
description: A 50+ slide complete beginner-friendly presentation covering Metabase fundamentals, installation, database connections, dashboards, questions, permissions, embedding, alerts, and real-world usage.

slides.heading: Welcome to Introduction to Metabase
slides.content: Overview of modern BI tools and the role of Metabase in data analytics.

slides.heading: What is Metabase?
slides.content: Open-source business intelligence and data visualization platform for teams.

slides.heading: Why Use Metabase?
slides.content: No-code analytics, dashboards, SQL support, alerts, easy sharing, embedding.

slides.heading: Metabase Key Features
slides.content: Questions, dashboards, models, collections, permissions, embedding, alerts.

slides.heading: Metabase Architecture Overview
slides.content: Web UI, application server, metadata DB, data sources, user access layer.

slides.heading: Where Metabase Fits
slides.content: Data exploration, dashboarding, reporting, self-service analytics.

slides.heading: Metabase Deployment Options
slides.content: Cloud, self-hosted JAR, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Linux, Windows.

slides.heading: Installation Methods
slides.content: Metabase JAR file, Docker image, cloud hosting, Helm chart.

slides.heading: Connecting Databases
slides.content: Supported DBs: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, SQLite, BigQuery, Snowflake.

slides.heading: Metadata Database
slides.content: Stores users, dashboards, queries, permissions. Recommended: PostgreSQL/MySQL.

slides.heading: First-Time Setup Wizard
slides.content: Admin account, DB setup, SMTP, optional sample data.

slides.heading: Understanding Questions
slides.content: Metabase query builder for charts, tables, metrics.

slides.heading: Simple Question Mode
slides.content: Point-and-click filtering, summarizing, grouping.

slides.heading: Custom Questions
slides.content: Advanced filters, aggregations, multiple joins.

slides.heading: Native SQL Questions
slides.content: Write SQL queries directly and visualize results.

slides.heading: Saved Questions
slides.content: Reusable data queries for dashboards and reports.

slides.heading: Visualizations in Metabase
slides.content: Bar, line, pie, KPI, pivot, funnel, map, scatter, combo charts.

slides.heading: Dashboards Overview
slides.content: Combine multiple questions into a single view for monitoring.

slides.heading: Dashboard Filters
slides.content: Date range, dropdowns, search boxes connected to all widgets.

slides.heading: Dashboard Layout & Design
slides.content: Resizing cards, arranging grid, text blocks, grouping.

slides.heading: Drill-Through Options
slides.content: Click to view details, underlying data, next-level insight.

slides.heading: Sharing Dashboards
slides.content: Public links, email delivery, exports, iframe embedding.

slides.heading: Metabase Collections
slides.content: Folders for organizing dashboards, questions, models.

slides.heading: Permissions & Security
slides.content: Groups, collection-level access, row-level data filtering.

slides.heading: User Roles
slides.content: Admin, Analyst, Viewer, SQL Editor access levels.

slides.heading: Row-Level Permissions
slides.content: Different users see filtered results based on rules.

slides.heading: Data Models in Metabase
slides.content: Define metrics, default filters, friendly column names.

slides.heading: Field Types & Metadata
slides.content: Mark columns as category, URL, currency, entity keys.

slides.heading: Metabase Alerts
slides.content: Email or Slack alerts when data crosses a threshold.

slides.heading: Subscriptions
slides.content: Automated scheduled reports sent via email.

slides.heading: Embedding Metabase
slides.content: Secure embedding for SaaS apps, JWT-based auth embedding.

slides.heading: Public Dashboards
slides.content: Open link dashboards for anonymous web access.

slides.heading: Metabase API
slides.content: REST API for automation, user sync, dashboard imports.

slides.heading: Audit Logs & Activity Monitoring
slides.content: Track queries, exports, logins, security changes.

slides.heading: Backups & Migration
slides.content: Backup metadata DB, move dashboards between servers.

slides.heading: Performance Optimizations
slides.content: Caching, indexing DB tables, using models, avoiding N+1 joins.

slides.heading: Metabase on PostgreSQL vs H2
slides.content: H2 for testing only, PostgreSQL for production stability.

slides.heading: Metabase in Docker
slides.content: docker run -d -p 3000:3000 metabase/metabase

slides.heading: Metabase in Kubernetes
slides.content: Helm chart deployment, autoscaling, config secrets.

slides.heading: Authentication Methods
slides.content: Email/password, Google SSO, LDAP, SAML, JWT SSO.

slides.heading: Metabase in SaaS Applications
slides.content: White-label analytics for customers via embedding.

slides.heading: Metabase vs Power BI vs Tableau
slides.content: Ease of use, cost, SQL support, embeddings, open-source model.

slides.heading: Real-World Use Cases
slides.content: Edu institute analytics, CRM dashboards, IoT device stats, finance KPIs.

slides.heading: Common Errors & Fixes
slides.content: Driver mismatch, SSL errors, slow queries, bad dashboard filters.

slides.heading: Troubleshooting Connectivity
slides.content: Firewall, driver config, SSH tunnel, connection pool size.

slides.heading: Metabase Best Practices
slides.content: Use models, avoid raw table access, create shared filters, naming consistency.

slides.heading: Learning Resources
slides.content: Docs, GitHub, Slack community, YouTube tutorials, sample dashboards.

slides.heading: Mini Quiz
slides.content: 5 quick questions to recap dashboards, questions, permissions, alerts.

slides.heading: Summary of Key Concepts
slides.content: Questions, dashboards, SQL, embedding, permissions, alerts.

slides.heading: Small Project Idea
slides.content: Build a KPI dashboard for attendance, sales, or IoT tracking.

slides.heading: Q&A and Next Steps
slides.content: Practice, connect real database, explore advanced embedding and API.
